actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 95-811.

official_title: A bill to provide for increases in appropriations ceilings for development ceilings, land acquisition for boundary changes in certain units of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 95-811) =Title I: Development Ceiling Increases= - Raises the appropriations authorization ceiling for development costs concerning 27 specified units of the National Park System. =Title II: Acquisition Ceiling Increases= - Increases the ceiling on appropriations authorizations for the acquisition of lands within six specified units of the National Park System. =Title III: Boundary Changes and Miscellaneous Provisions= - Permits the Secretary of the Interior to make changes in the boundaries of 21 specified units of the National Park System. Makes specified boundary changes, effective upon publication in the Federal Register, of a map or other description of the change. Specifies procedures to be followed by the Secretary of the Interior in the acquisition of lands covered by this Act. Amends the Act of July 21, 1955 to redesignate the City of Refuge National Historical Park as the Honaunau National Historical Park. Permits the Secretary to revise the boundaries of the Allegheny Portage Railorad National Historic Site and the Jamestown Flood National Memorial, in Pennsylvania. Defines the boundaries of the Fort Laramie National Historic Site, Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increases in appropriations ceilings for development ceilings, land acquisition for boundary changes in certain units of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
